candidate().details: Returns the candidate that can become the owner.

getLiquidityCoefficientInFundingPayment(.details: This is the view version of `updateFundingGrowthAndLiquidityCoefficientInFundingPayment()`, so only part of the funding payment will be returned. Use it with caution because it does not return all the pending funding payment of orders. **Normally you won't need to use this function**

returns.liquidityCoefficientInFundingPayment: the funding payment of all orders/liquidity of a maker

returns._0: he open order info encoded in `OpenOrder.Info`
The open order info encoded in `OpenOrder.Info`

params.fetchBase: True if fetch base token amount, false if fetch quote token amount

returns.totalPendingFee: The total pending fees in the orders

params.fetchBase: True if fetch base token amount, false if fetch quote token amount

returns.pendingFee: The total pending fees in the orders

returns._0: True if the trader has order in given markets

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setOwner(address).details: Set ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

uniswapV3MintCallback(uint256,uint256,by.details: In the implementation you must pay the pool tokens owed for the minted liquidity. The caller of this method must be checked to be a UniswapV3Pool deployed by the canonical UniswapV3Factory.

params.amount0Owed: The amount of token0 due to the pool for the minted liquidity
params.amount1Owed: The amount of token1 due to the pool for the minted liquidity
params.data: Any data passed through by the caller via the IUniswapV3PoolActions#mint call

updateFundingGrowthAndLiquidityCoefficie.details: This is the non-view version of `getLiquidityCoefficientInFundingPayment()`, only can be called by `ClearingHouse` contract

params.fundingGrowthGlobal: The funding growth info, detail on `Funding.Growth`

returns.liquidityCoefficientInFundingPayment: the funding payment of all orders/liquidity of a maker

updateOwner().details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`_candidate`). Can only be called by the new owner.

ExchangeChanged(address).notice: Emitted when the `Exchange` contract address changed

getLiquidityCoefficientInFundingPayment(.notice: Get the pending funding payment of all orders in the given market

getOpenOrder(address,address,int24,int24.notice: Get open order info by given base token, upper tick and lower tick

getOpenOrderById(bytes32).notice: Get open order info by given order id

getOpenOrderIds(address,address).notice: Get open order ids of a trader in the given market

getPendingFee(address,address,int24,int2.notice: Get the pending fees of a order

getTotalOrderDebt(address,address,bool).notice: Get the total debt token amount (base or quote) of all orders in the given market

getTotalQuoteBalanceAndPendingFee(addres.notice: Get the total quote token amount and pending fees of all orders in given markets

getTotalTokenAmountInPoolAndPendingFee(a.notice: Get the total token amount (quote or base) and pending fees of all orders in the given market

hasOrder(address,address[]).notice: Check if the specified trader has order in given markets

removeLiquidity((address,address,int24,i.notice: Remove liquidity logic, only used by `ClearingHouse` contract

replaySwap((address,bool,bool,int256,uin.notice: Replay the swap and get the swap result (price impact and swap fee), only can be called by `ClearingHouse` contract;

uniswapV3MintCallback(uint256,uint256,by.notice: Called to `msg.sender` after minting liquidity to a position from IUniswapV3Pool#mint.
